title: Ewian - Good Old Underground [2014]
description:
Ewian was formed in March, 2013 by German composer Ewian Christensen, who is responsible for lead vocals, piano, sound composition and majority of songwriting. 

"Good Old Underground" is the first full-length release, and focuses on the fringes of society and those who live in it. Some songs of the album arose from collaborations (Featuring / Remix) with artists outside of germany, for example electronic singer/songwriter Fifi Rong (London) or instrumental Post-Rock artist James Hrabak (Chicago). Their energetic 'wall of sound' includes distorted piano, noisy guitars, bittersweet vocal melodies, and solemn string passages - landing them somewhere between Placebo, Sigur Ros and Radiohead. 

Quality: 128kbps

Downloaded from bandcamp

Enjoy! ;-)
